# NEURLFilterControlProviderConfiguration

**Class**

A class that defines app extension configurations for the URL Filter control provider app extension.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency class NEURLFilterControlProviderConfiguration
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEURLFilterControlProvider] uses this class to conform to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ExtensionKit] framework. Your extension doesn’t need to use this class directly.

## URL filters

- **NEURLFilterManager**: A class you use to configure and control a URL filter.
- **NEURLFilterControlProvider**: A protocol that defines an object that’s responsible for fetching pre-filter data.
- **NEURLFilter**: A class used to voluntarily validate URLs for apps that don’t use WebKit or the URL session API.
- **Filtering traffic by URL**: Perform fast and robust filtering of full URLs by managing URL filtering configurations.

## Inherits From

- NEAppExtensionConfiguration

## Conforms To

- AppExtensionConfiguration
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
